name: astro-launchpad
description: An Astro 2.0 project template for decent projects: auth, i18next, tailwind, sitemap, webworker, robots.txt, preact, react, endpoints, endpoint client, OpenAPI, OAuth, various Astro features and data loading preconfigured

scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production dotenv yarn turbo run build --concurrency=1
scripts.preview: NODE_ENV=production dotenv yarn turbo run preview
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development dotenv yarn turbo run dev
